Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Bead
Description: This is a long bead with a relatively smooth surface. Its overall shape is slightly convex, the diametre at the extremities being 0,3 cm and the diametre in the middle of the body of the bead being 0,6 cm. It is pierced longitudinally.
